sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司制定了新的规章制度。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī zhìdìng le xīn de guīzhāng zhìdù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a établi de nouveaux règlements.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company has established new regulations.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要遵守学校的制度。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào zūnshǒu xuéxiào de zhìdù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons respecter les règles de l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must follow the school's rules.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiáng shàng de zhōng xiǎnshì sān diǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'horloge au mur indique trois heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The clock on the wall shows three o'clock.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La bibliothèque est très silencieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The library is very quiet.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Avant, j'habitais à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I used to live in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai enfin terminé mes devoirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I finally finished my homework.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中华民族有悠久的历史。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōnghuá mínzú yǒu yōujiǔ de lìshǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nation chinoise a une longue histoire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Chinese nation has a long history.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'école va organiser une compétition sportive.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The school will hold a sports meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào zhōuwéi yǒu hěn duō shāngdiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de magasins autour de l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many shops around the school.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngchǎng lǐ yǒu hěn duō zhū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de cochons à la ferme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many pigs on the farm.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle présente ce programme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She hosts this program.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a proposé son aide de sa propre initiative.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He took the initiative to offer help.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger des bananes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like eating bananas.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je préconise de résoudre les problèmes pacifiquement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I advocate solving problems peacefully.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin de ton aide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need your help.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez faire attention à la sécurité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pay attention to safety.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est ta spécialité à l'université ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is your major at university?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì zhège lǐngyù de zhuānjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est expert dans ce domaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is an expert in this field.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn zhuānmén mài cháyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce magasin vend exclusivement du thé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This shop specializes in selling tea.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en très bonne forme aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is in very good condition today.
